UI: Content Card

Booking Card

The Booking Card displays reservations and appointment scheduling. Features service/venue name, date and time selection, duration, capacity/party size, pricing, cancellation policy, booking reference, and special requests. Emits custom events for slot selection. Uses Schema.org/Reservation markup.
